name: The strange life of Bill the postman
name_original: The strange life of Bill the postman
description:
Game Ludum Dare 44 - Your life is currency 

Bill the postman live in a world where life is time and this time is currency.

He earns time when he posts letters. 

You have to help him to post letters to keep him alive.

But don't forget to feed him...

******

Commands : 

Space ( Keyboard ) / Y ( Gamepad) : Jump 
Arrows/ WASD (Keyboard) / JoyStick ( Gamepad ) : Movement 

******

Have a good Game !
